Portland.Northwest 6th & Davis Street and Northwe:
Northwest 6th & Davis Street and Northwest 5th & Couch Street are a pair of light rail stations on the MAX Green, Orange and Yellow Lines in Portland, Oregon. It is the 2nd stop southbound on the Portland Transit Mall extension.
The stations are built into the sidewalks of 5th and 6th Avenues, with the 5th Avenue platform served by southbound trains and the 6th Avenue platform by northbound trains.
